column1: Westernesse was a name in the Westron for the Númenor.
The ending -ess (also in Elvenesse) was used in romance literature for fictional lands that had partly francized names (as in wikipedia:Lyonesse in wikipedia:Matter of Britain).
J.R.R. Tolkien noted that the name is Middle English
column3: taken to mean "Western lands" (in contrast to the East).

column1: In the 13 century chivalric romance Wikipedia:King_Horn
column2: Wikipedia:Westernesse is a kingdom ruled by "King Ailmar" and it is reached by ship by Horn.
